overview:
Takuju is an experienced and versatile engineering lead who has worked on and developed platforms for several groundbreaking online companies. He currently serves as VP of Engineering at SteelHouse, a digital display advertising platform for eCommerce marketers.

He began his career at Sony and then moved onto Fujitsu as a QA Engineer. Takuju then took on a position at eHarmony as a QA Manager. Immediately before joining SteelHouse, Takuju served as the QA Lead at the Rubicon Project.
